answers.answer: I'm a first time mom and only 7 months but I do know Braxton hicks contractions shouldn't last long nor carrying on through out the day constantly. I'd call my doctor!

Okay thank you! (:that's a lot of help it just worries me because I already have preeclampsia and I'm suppose to have him Friday because of my high blood pressure but I wasn't to sure about these pains.
I'd still call your doctor they might want you to come in earlier than Friday? I wish I knew more to help! But good luck with labor and make sure you're getting tons of bed rest :)

My midwife told me that the difference with Braxton hicks and contractions is that with Braxton hick you shouldn't be feeling pain, you should only be feeling your stomach hardening . So I think you should call your dr!

question: I am 36 weeks & 4 days and I went to see my doctor today and he sent me down to get an ultrasound while I was laying there I had couple bad contractions up in my stomach  but now I have been feeling them where my pubic hair is and they are sharp pains almost feel like period pains , there is cramping, they dont last long they come and go maybe every 5 to 10 mins and I'm not sure if they are Braxton hicks or real contractions. Please help!
title: Braxton Hicks or Real!!???
